name: IT201_Project01_Brandon_Sanchez
description:
This project allows users to create and change color of 3 different types of shapes, cube, cylinder, and sphere. This project also lets the user destroy said objects and be able to tell them their mouse position. 

The project has an interface that allows users to change three distinct colors for the shapes, red, green, and blue. As well as a button that will destroy everything that's on screen as well as a button that toggles timed destroyed. There is also a mouse position indicator on the top right corner of the project. And to top it all off, the project is accompanied by a song while users paint. The song is Underclass by King Krule.
